name: Image.Scale
desc: A scale to apply to vector images relative to text.

items.name: case small
items.desc: A scale that produces small images.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: A scale that produces medium-sized images.

items.name: case large
items.desc: A scale that produces large images.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two scales are unequal.

items.name: static func == (Image.Scale, Image.Scale) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two scales are equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the scale by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the scale.
